issue.summary: Finance Priority - Neuven User - Client Invoices - Need Export to Excel button for multiple invoices list

testCase.name: Neuven User - Client Invoices page - Check Export to excel functionality
testCase.precondition: Open www.vennue-dev.com on Chrome

step.description: Log into www.vennue-dev.com
step.expectedResult: Log in should be successfull and home page should be displayed

step.description: From Home page Navigate to clients and from drop down select client invoices
step.expectedResult: Invoices page should be displayed

step.description: Check if Export to excel icon is present and showing proper export file type in the Invoices Page
step.expectedResult: Should be as specified on the requirement

step.description: Check if the export to excel tool tip appears when mouse is hovered over it
step.expectedResult: Should be able to see "export to excel" or "export to CSV" toll tip

step.description: Check if an excel file is downloaded when export to excel is clicked by selecting atleast 1 invoice
step.expectedResult: A excel file should be downloaded

step.description: Check if user is able to open, Edit and save the Excel sheet downloaded
step.expectedResult: User should be able to open, edit and save the excel file

step.description: Check the location of the downloaded file
step.expectedResult: Location of the file should be This PC- Downloads

step.description: Check number formatting and column names on the Excel Sheet is same as shown on the page
step.expectedResult: Number formatting and column names on the excel sheet should be same as displayed on the invoices page

step.description: Verify the data on the excel sheet
step.expectedResult: Data on the excel sheet should be same as on the invoices page and also should correspond to the selection made

step.description: Verify the output when export to excel functionality is clicked without selecting any invoice
step.expectedResult: Error Message "Please select at least one row to export" should be displayed

step.description: Verify by selecting multiple rows which are not consecutive using control button
step.expectedResult: Data on exported file should correspond and match with the exact rows selected

step.description: Verify by selecting large number of rows or all rows using CTRL A
step.expectedResult: Data of all the rows selected should be downloaded

step.description: Verify  by clicking on the export to excel button multiple times
step.expectedResult: Multiple files should be downloaded in the downloads folder

step.description: Verify the name of the file downloaded
step.expectedResult: File name should be same as what is mentioned in the requirement

step.description: Verify Step1 to Step14 on Firefox browser
step.expectedResult: All the expected results from Step1 to Step14 should be met.

step.description: Verify Step1 to Step14 on IE browser
step.expectedResult: All the expected results from Step1 to Step14 should be met.

issue.summary: Neuven User- Rate Creation- New Rate- Cancel button does not work

testCase.name: Verify the Cancel functionality in Rate Creation Page
testCase.objective: While creating a New Rate the user should be able to use the Cancel button to cancel the rate creation using the cancel button. By hitting the cancel button User should be able to reset the rate creation page and erase any fields that were previously filled
testCase.precondition: Log in as Neuven User who has permissions for Rate Creation

step.description: Log in a neuven User in www.venneu-dev.com
step.expectedResult: User logged in successfully and landed in Home Page

step.description: From Home page Navigate to Rates and choose rate creation from the dropdown
step.expectedResult: User see rate creation window and a table of all existing rates at the bottom of that window

step.description: Create a rate filling in all the fields
step.expectedResult: User should be able to enter all the details successfully

step.description: Click on cancel at the bottom of the window
step.expectedResult: User should see all the fields been reset and there is no previously filled details on the rate creation window.

step.description: Fill only few fields and then click cancel

Click on Manage worker details
Edit Worker
Click Create Worker and add documents or Save Worker and edit documents
Add Employee Documents

testCase.name: Add Employee Documents Page

testScript.details:
Page to contain
  •   Please upload scanned copies of below documents:
  • Select document type dropdown
    • Dropdown to load with all the default documents set in the documents administration page
    • Dropdown to also include client-specific documents set in the documents administration page - for the clients the agency is linked to.
  • Expiry Date
    • Date picker to choose a date
    • Not a mandatory field
    • Allow Null entries (Expiry date is irrelevant for some document types)
  •  Drop or click to upload documents here
    • Dropbox for documents
    • Specify the allowed formats and size of the document at the bottom of the Dropbox as shown on the mockup
    • Allow drag and drop or click through to choose documents to upload
  • Upload button
    • Click
    • The document is uploaded and shown in the table below

testCase.name: Error Messages

testScript.details:
• Upload clicked without choosing document type ‘please select document type’ displayed.
  • Upload clicked with a document that does not match with the specified formats ‘document filetype not supported’ is displayed
  • Upload clicked with a document that exceeds the specified size ‘File too large for upload’ displayed
  • Upload clicked without a document in the drop box ‘Please choose a file to upload’ is displayed
  • Upload clicked with a document type that already exists on the table ‘Document already exist – Do you want to replace the existing document’ displayed in a pop-up window
    • Yes Button
      • Clicked - Document replaced – window closed
    • No Button
      • Clicked – window closed

testCase.name: Existing Employee Documents table - Settings

testScript.details:
• Table to have a search box at the top
  • Table to have pagination at the bottom
  • Page numbers to be clickable, and arrows to move forward and backward by the user
  • Table to have select page size drop-down at the bottom with 10,20,50 and 100 options
  • When page size is selected table should show the appropriate number of rows based on the selection
  • The bottom of the table shows the total number of items on current pages vs the overall total number of items (EG Showing 10 of 100 entries), in the right corner

testCase.name: Existing Employee Documents table

testScript.details:
Table columns
  • Document type
    • Document type selected when uploading is displayed
  • Document Name
    • Document File Name is displayed
  • Expiry Date
    • Expiry date selected when uploading is displayed
  • Uploaded On
    • Display date document was uploaded
  • Action
    • Delete icon displayed
      • Clicked – ‘Are you sure you want to delete the document’ displayed in a pop-up window
      • Yes Button
        • Clicked – Document Deleted– window closed
      • No Button
        • Clicked – window closed

testCase.name: Logged in as a Client User

testScript.details:
• View Worker Documents
  • Select Agency
  • Documents – View
  • Window displaying List of default documents plus the client-specific documents with upload details displayed.
  • There are no changes to this window – except the list of documents shown will now change dynamically based on client viewing the documents - linked to client-specific documents defined in the documents maintenance page
  • Also add a new column Mandatory and show whether the document type was specified as mandatory in the documents maintenance page
